item.title: China to impose retaliatory tariffs on some Canadian products as trade war heats up
item.description: China on Saturday announced retaliatory tariffs on Canadian agricultural goods, hitting back after Ottawa slapped import duties on Chinese-made EVs.

item.title: Trump Organization sues Capital One bank over account closures after Jan. 6 Capitol riot
item.description: The Trump companies accuse Capitol One of having "'woke' beliefs that it needed to distance itself from President Trump and his conservative political...

item.title: U.S. cancels $400 million in grants, contracts to Columbia University over Gaza protests
item.description: Columbia was at the center of college protests in which demonstrators demanded an end to U.S. support for Israel due to civilian deaths and humanitari...

item.title: Trump blames ‘globalists’ for stock market sell-off
item.description: President Donald Trump also reiterated that his tariffs could, at least briefly, cause "disruption" in the equity markets.

item.title: European leaders push defense spend amid uncertainty over Trump aid to Ukraine
item.description: European leaders have upped the ante on defense spending plans as they look to support Kyiv and fill a potential void of U.S. aid.
